snippet.title: Hue - Coming Soon Trailer | PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One & PC
snippet.description:
BIG ANNOUNCEMENT, Hue  is now releasing 30th August on Xbox One, PS4 and PC with Vita following in September (as a cross-buy).

Hue is a vibrant, award-winning puzzle-platformer, where you alter the world by changing its background colour. You explore a dangerous grey land, unearthing coloured fragments on a journey to find your missing mother. As obstacles match the background, they disappear, creating new and exciting puzzles - full of peril, mystery… and colours unseen.

http://www.huethegame.com/
